mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT( VIDEODESCRIPTION, PDESCRIPTION, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTTYPE, RECOMMEND, SUPPORTCOUNT, VIDEOLENGTH, TEAMID, FLAG, VISIBLE, HRET, TAGS, SHOWTYPE, SESSIONID, CREATIONTIME ) VALUES( #{videoDescription}, #{pDescription}, #{productName}, ${productType}, ${recommend}, ${supportCount}, #{videoLength}, ${teamId}, ${flag}, ${visible}, #{hret}, #{tags}, ${showType}, #{sessionId}, DATE_FORMAT(#{creationTime},'%Y-%m-%d') )
mapper.select: SELECT pro.PRODUCTID AS productId, pro.VIDEOURL AS videoUrl, pro.VIDEODESCRIPTION AS videoDescription, pro.PDESCRIPTION AS pDescription, pro.PRODUCTNAME AS PRODUCTNAME, pro.PICHDURL AS PICHDURL, pro.PICLDURL AS picLDUrl, pro.VISIBLE AS visible, pro.PRODUCTTYPE AS productType, DATE_FORMAT(pro.UPLOADDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS uploadDate, pro.RECOMMEND AS recommend, pro.SUPPORTCOUNT AS supportCount, pro.VIDEOLENGTH AS videoLength, t.TEAMID AS teamId, t.TEAMNAME AS teamName, t.TEAMPHOTOURL AS teamPhotoUrl, t.TEAMDESCRIPTION AS teamDescription, pro.HRET AS hret, pro.TAGS AS tags, pro.SHOWTYPE AS showType, pro.SESSIONID AS sessionId, DATE_FORMAT(pro.CREATIONTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') AS creationTime, pro.MASTERWORK AS masterWork FROM PRODUCT pro LEFT JOIN TEAM t ON pro.TEAMID = t.TEAMID WHERE pro.PRODUCTID = ${productId}
SELECT pro.PRODUCTID AS productId, pro.PRODUCTNAME AS productName FROM PRODUCT pro

SELECT pro.PRODUCTID AS productId, pro.VIDEOURL AS videoUrl, pro.VIDEODESCRIPTION AS videoDescription, pro.PDESCRIPTION AS pDescription, pro.PRODUCTNAME AS productName, pro.PICHDURL AS picHDUrl, pro.PICLDURL AS picLDUrl, pro.VISIBLE AS visible, pro.HRET AS hret, i.ITEMNAME AS productTypeName, pro.VIDEOLENGTH AS videoLength, pro.TEAMID AS teamId, pro.TAGS AS tags, pro.SHOWTYPE AS showType, pro.SESSIONID AS sessionId, DATE_FORMAT(pro.CREATIONTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') AS creationTime, pro.MASTERWORK AS masterWork FROM PRODUCT pro LEFT JOIN ITEM i ON i.ITEMID = pro.PRODUCTTYPE WHERE 1 = 1 AND pro.PRODUCTID = ${productId}

SELECT pro.PRODUCTID AS productId, pro.VIDEOURL AS videoUrl, pro.VIDEODESCRIPTION AS videoDescription, pro.PDESCRIPTION AS pDescription, pro.PRODUCTNAME AS productName, pro.PICHDURL AS picHDUrl, pro.PICLDURL AS picLDUrl, pro.VISIBLE AS visible, i.ITEMNAME AS productTypeName, t.TEAMPHOTOURL AS teamPhotoUrl, pro.VIDEOLENGTH AS videoLength, pro.TEAMID AS teamId, pro.HRET AS hret, pro.TAGS AS tags, pro.SESSIONID AS sessionId, pro.SHOWTYPE AS showType, t.TEAMNAME AS teamName, t.TEAMDESCRIPTION AS teamDescription, DATE_FORMAT(pro.CREATIONTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') AS creationTime, pro.MASTERWORK AS masterWork, DATE_FORMAT( pro.UPDATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS updateDate FROM PRODUCT pro LEFT JOIN ITEM i ON i.ITEMID = pro.PRODUCTTYPE LEFT JOIN TEAM t ON t.TEAMID = pro.TEAMID WHERE 1 = 1 AND pro.FLAG = 1 AND pro.VISIBLE = 0 AND t.FLAG = 1 AND t.TEAMID = ${teamId}

SELECT pro.PRODUCTID AS productId, pro.VIDEOURL AS videoUrl, pro.VIDEODESCRIPTION AS videoDescription, pro.PDESCRIPTION AS pDescription, pro.PRODUCTNAME AS productName, pro.PICHDURL AS picHDUrl, pro.PICLDURL AS picLDUrl, pro.VISIBLE AS visible, t.TEAMPHOTOURL AS teamPhotoUrl, pro.VIDEOLENGTH AS videoLength, pro.TEAMID AS teamId, pro.HRET AS hret, pro.TAGS AS tags, pro.SESSIONID AS sessionId, pro.SHOWTYPE AS showType, t.TEAMNAME AS teamName, t.TEAMDESCRIPTION AS teamDescription, pro.MASTERWORK AS masterWork, DATE_FORMAT(IF(creationTime = NULL ,uploadDate,creationTime),'%Y-%m-%d') AS creationTime FROM PRODUCT pro LEFT JOIN TEAM t ON t.TEAMID = pro.TEAMID WHERE 1 = 1 AND pro.FLAG = 1 AND pro.VISIBLE = 0 AND t.FLAG = 1 AND t.TEAMID = ${teamId} ORDER BY creationTime DESC

SELECT pro.PRODUCTID AS productId, pro.VIDEOURL AS videoUrl, pro.VIDEODESCRIPTION AS videoDescription, pro.PDESCRIPTION AS pDescription, pro.PRODUCTNAME AS productName, pro.PICHDURL AS picHDUrl, pro.PICLDURL AS picLDUrl, pro.PRODUCTTYPE AS productType, pro.VISIBLE AS visible, pro.HRET AS hret, i.ITEMNAME AS productTypeName, DATE_FORMAT(pro.UPLOADDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS uploadDate, pro.RECOMMEND AS recommend, pro.SUPPORTCOUNT AS supportCount, pro.VIDEOLENGTH AS videoLength, pro.TEAMID AS teamId, t.TEAMNAME AS teamName, pro.TAGS AS tags, pro.SHOWTYPE AS showType, pro.SESSIONID AS sessionId, DATE_FORMAT(pro.CREATIONTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') AS creationTime, pro.MASTERWORK AS masterWork FROM PRODUCT pro LEFT JOIN ITEM i ON i.ITEMID = pro.PRODUCTTYPE LEFT JOIN TEAM t ON t.TEAMID = pro.TEAMID WHERE 1 = 1 AND pro.FLAG = 1 ORDER BY pro.RECOMMEND,pro.SUPPORTCOUNT DESC LIMIT ${begin} , ${limit}

SELECT pro.PRODUCTID AS productId, pro.VIDEOURL AS videoUrl, pro.VIDEODESCRIPTION AS videoDescription, pro.PDESCRIPTION AS pDescription, pro.PRODUCTNAME AS productName, pro.PICHDURL AS picHDUrl, pro.PICLDURL AS picLDUrl, pro.PRODUCTTYPE AS productType, pro.RECOMMEND AS recommend, pro.SUPPORTCOUNT AS supportCount, pro.VIDEOLENGTH AS videoLength, pro.TEAMID AS teamId, pro.VISIBLE AS visible, pro.HRET AS hret, pro.TAGS AS tags, pro.SHOWTYPE AS showType, pro.SESSIONID AS sessionId, DATE_FORMAT(pro.CREATIONTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') AS creationTime, pro.MASTERWORK AS masterWork FROM PRODUCT pro LEFT JOIN TEAM t ON t.TEAMID = pro.TEAMID WHERE pro.TEAMID = ${teamId} AND pro.FLAG = 1 AND pro.VISIBLE = 0 AND t.FLAG = 1 ORDER BY pro.UPLOADDATE,pro.RECOMMEND,pro.SUPPORTCOUNT DESC LIMIT 0 , 1

SELECT pro.PRODUCTID AS productId, pro.VIDEOURL AS videoUrl, pro.VIDEODESCRIPTION AS videoDescription, pro.PDESCRIPTION AS pDescription, pro.PRODUCTNAME AS productName, pro.PICHDURL AS picHDUrl, pro.PICLDURL AS picLDUrl, pro.VISIBLE AS visible, i.ITEMNAME AS productTypeName, t.TEAMPHOTOURL AS teamPhotoUrl, pro.VIDEOLENGTH AS videoLength, pro.TEAMID AS teamId, t.TEAMNAME AS teamName, t.TEAMDESCRIPTION AS teamDescription, pro.HRET AS hret, pro.TAGS AS tags, pro.SHOWTYPE AS showType, pro.SESSIONID AS sessionId, DATE_FORMAT(pro.CREATIONTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') AS creationTime, pro.MASTERWORK AS masterWork FROM PRODUCT pro LEFT JOIN ITEM i ON i.ITEMID = pro.PRODUCTTYPE INNER JOIN TEAM t ON t.TEAMID = pro.TEAMID WHERE 1 = 1 AND pro.FLAG <> 2 AND t.TEAMID = ${teamId}

SELECT DISTINCT pro.PRODUCTID AS productId, pro.PDESCRIPTION AS pDescription, pro.PRODUCTNAME AS productName, pro.PICLDURL AS picLDUrl, pro.TEAMID AS teamId, pro.HRET AS hret, pro.TAGS AS tags, pro.SHOWTYPE AS showType, pro.SESSIONID AS sessionId, pro.RECOMMEND AS recommend, ser.SERVICEREALPRICE AS serviceRealPrice, ser.SERVICEPRICE AS servicePrice, t.TEAMNAME AS teamName FROM PRODUCT pro INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(serviceRealPrice) AS SERVICEREALPRICE,MIN(servicePrice) AS SERVICEPRICE,productId FROM SERVICE GROUP BY productId HAVING productId ) ser ON pro.PRODUCTID = ser.PRODUCTID INNER JOIN ITEM i ON pro.PRODUCTTYPE = i.ITEMID INNER JOIN TEAM t ON pro.TEAMID = t.TEAMID WHERE 1 = 1 AND pro.FLAG = 1 AND pro.visible = 0 AND pro.RECOMMEND <> 0 AND i.ISACTIVE = 0 AND t.FLAG = 1 ORDER BY ser.SERVICEREALPRICE ASC,pro.RECOMMEND DESC,pro.SUPPORTCOUNT DESC

SELECT pro.PRODUCTID AS productId, pro.VIDEOURL AS videoUrl, pro.PDESCRIPTION AS pDescription, pro.PRODUCTNAME AS productName, pro.PICHDURL AS picHDUrl, pro.PICLDURL AS picLDUrl, pro.VISIBLE AS visible, i.ITEMNAME AS productTypeName, pro.VIDEOLENGTH AS videoLength, pro.HRET AS hret, pro.TAGS AS tags FROM PRODUCT pro LEFT JOIN ITEM i ON i.ITEMID = pro.PRODUCTTYPE INNER JOIN TEAM t ON t.TEAMID = pro.TEAMID WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.flag = 4 AND t.loginName = 'bd' AND pro.FLAG = 1 AND pro.visible = 0

SELECT DISTINCT pro.PRODUCTID AS productId, pro.PRODUCTNAME AS productName, pro.TAGS AS tags, t.TEAMNAME AS teamName FROM PRODUCT pro INNER JOIN ITEM i ON pro.PRODUCTTYPE = i.ITEMID INNER JOIN TEAM t ON pro.TEAMID = t.TEAMID WHERE 1 = 1 AND pro.FLAG = 1 AND pro.visible = 0 AND pro.RECOMMEND <> 0 AND i.ISACTIVE = 0 AND t.FLAG = 1
